item.title: Get Delta/Elapse time in Python
item.description: How to get delta time in python? Python provide time module, as my favourite way to get delta / elapse time, of course, depends on what you need. I usually do taking user normal actions, by getting a simple hour-minute-seconds, like time taken running scripts, batching, clicking buttons and navigate between tabs, or buttons. import time startTime = time.time() # doing blah... blah... # whatever actions we do in here elapsedTime = time.
